features.featureTitle: Update the plan tier configuration object in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` (and any other frontend location where plan data is hardcoded, such as `frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSection.tsx`) to match the updated pricing, limits, and license counts exactly: Basic (30 faculty, 500 PDFs, 2 licenses), Premium (100 faculty, 2000 PDFs, 4 licenses), Diamond (500 faculty, 5000 PDFs, 6 licenses), with all four billing cycle prices as specified. Each plan card in the Subscription Management section must display the license count (e.g., '2 Licenses') alongside the faculty limit, PDF limit, and price.
